question: Which of the following is correct for a gated D-type flip-flop?

answers.a: The Q output is either SET or RESET as soon as the D input goes HIGH or LOW
answers.b: The output complement follows the input when enabled
answers.c: Only one of the inputs can be HIGH at a time
answers.d: The output toggles if one of the inputs is held HIGH

question: A basic S-R flip-flop can be constructed by cross-coupling of which basic logic gates?
